section.title: Status
section.para: View where you can monitor deployments in progress, or list of waiting works.

section.title: Job Status
section.para: You can check the deployments that are in progress or waiting. Deployment is done one case at a time, and the rest of the cases are waiting. You can stop a deployment in progress or delete a waiting one.
For the deployments that are in progress, you can see the progress rate and information on file that is under deployment.
